sentences: ['AND APB 28-1, \x93INTERIM DISCLOSURES ABOUT FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS,\x94 WHICH IS NOW CODIFIED IN THE ASC UNDER TOPIC 825, \x93FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS\x94 (\x93ASC TOPIC 825\x94).', 'REQUIREMENTS CONCERNING THE FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS TO INTERIM FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF PUBLICLY TRADED COMPANIES.', 'WE DID NOT PURCHASE DERIVATIVE FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS IN THE THREE- AND NINE-MONTH PERIODS ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2009 AND 2008.'],['EXTEND THE ANNUAL DISCLOSURES ABOUT FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS TO INTERIM REPORTING'],['107-1, “INTERIM DISCLOSURES ABOUT FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS” (“FSP SFAS 107-1”) WHICH REQUIRES DISCLOSURES ABOUT FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS IN', 'THESE PROVISIONS ALSO REQUIRE ENTITIES TO DISCLOSE THE METHOD(S) AND SIGNIFICANT ASSUMPTIONS USED TO ESTIMATE THE FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS IN FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ON AN INTERIM AND ANNUAL BASIS AND TO HIGHLIGHT ANY CHANGES FROM PRIOR PERIODS.'],[', TO REQUIRE DISCLOSURES ABOUT FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS FOR INTERIM REPORTING PERIODS OF PUBLICLY TRADED COMPANIES AS WELL AS IN ANNUAL FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.'],["AN UPDATED DESCRIPTION OF THE COMPANY'S DERIVATIVE FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS; AND", 'FURTHER DISCUSSION ABOUT THESE CONTRACTS AND OTHER FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS, SEE PART I, ITEM 3, "QUANTITATIVE AND QUALITATIVE DISCLOSURES ABOUT MARKET RISK."'],['DISCLOSURES ABOUT FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS IN INTERIM FINANCIAL'],['POSITIONS, FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS AND INVENTORY OBSOLESCENCE.'],['UTILIZE FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS FOR TRADING PURPOSES AND HOLD NO DERIVATIVE', 'MARKET RISK EXPOSURE WITH REGARD TO FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS IS TO CHANGES IN'],['FAS 107-1 AND APB 28-1, \x93INTERIM DISCLOSURES ABOUT FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS,\x94 OR ASC', 'USED TO ESTIMATE THE FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS AND A DISCUSSION OF CHANGES, IF ANY, IN'],['IN APRIL 2009, THE FASB ISSUED AN UPDATE THAT REQUIRES DISCLOSURE ABOUT THE FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS WHENEVER SUMMARIZED FINANCIAL INFORMATION FOR INTERIM PERIODS IS ISSUED, AND REQUIRES DISCLOSURE OF THE FAIR VALUE OF ALL FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS (WHERE PRACTICABLE) IN THE BODY OR ACCOMPANYING NOTES OF INTERIM AND ANNUAL FINANCIAL', 'WHICH PROHIBIT THE USE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS FOR TRADING OR SPECULATIVE PURPOSES.', 'DERIVATIVE FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS - THE COMPANY HAS WRITTEN POLICIES AND PROCEDURES THAT PLACE ALL FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS UNDER THE DIRECTION OF THE COMPANY CORPORATE TREASURY AND RESTRICT DERIVATIVE TRANSACTIONS TO THOSE INTENDED FOR HEDGING PURPOSES.', 'COMPANY USES FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS TO MANAGE THE MARKET RISK FROM CHANGES IN FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES.'],['WE DO NOT ENTER INTO DERIVATIVES OR OTHER FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS FOR TRADING OR SPECULATIVE PURPOSES.'],['MARKET RISK IS A BROAD TERM FOR THE RISK OF ECONOMIC LOSS DUE TO ADVERSE CHANGES IN THE FAIR VALUE OF FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS.', 'FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS THAT ARE SUBJECT TO MARKET RISK CAN BE CLASSIFIED EITHER AS HELD FOR TRADING OR HELD FOR PURPOSES OTHER THAN TRADING.']
